nodes.id: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中部战区的陆军组成部分，机关驻地位于河北省石家庄市。其部队主要来自原北京军区和济南军区。
description.en: The ground force component of the People's Liberation Army Central Theater Command, with its headquarters in Shijiazhuang, Hebei Province. Its troops primarily come from the former Beijing Military Region and Jinan Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的陆上作战部队，是中国人民解放军的主体力量。
description.en: The land-based service branch of the People's Liberation Army and the largest and oldest branch of the entire Chinese armed forces.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军中部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军五个战区之一，主要负责领导和指挥北京、天津、河北、河南、山西、陕西、湖北等地的所属武装力量。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the People's Liberation Army, responsible for leading and commanding the armed forces in areas including Beijing, Tianjin, Hebei, Henan, Shanxi, Shaanxi, and Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，现任中国人民解放军中部战区陆军司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, currently serving as the Commander of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，现任中国人民解放军中部战区陆军政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, currently serving as the Political Commissar of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河北省的省会，中国人民解放军中部战区陆军机关驻地。
description.en: The capital of Hebei Province, People's Republic of China, and the headquarters location of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。2016年，他向新成立的五大战区授予军旗并发布训令。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. In 2016, he presented flags and issued orders to the newly established five theater commands.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军已撤销的七大军区之一。2016年军改后，其部分部队被划归新成立的中部战区陆军。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army. After the 2016 military reform, some of its units were reassigned to the newly formed Central Theater Command Ground Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军济南军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军济南军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军已撤销的七大军区之一。2016年军改后，其部分部队被划归新成立的中部战区陆军。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army. After the 2016 military reform, some of its units were reassigned to the newly formed Central Theater Command Ground Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军确山合同战术训练基地

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军确山合同战术训练基地

description.en: A directly subordinate unit of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军下辖的集团军之一。
description.en: One of the group armies under the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军下辖的集团军之一。
description.en: One of the group armies under the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军直属部队。
description.en: A directly subordinate unit of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任中国人民解放军中部战区陆军首任司令员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the first commander of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任中国人民解放军中部战区陆军司令员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the commander of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the deputy commander of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the first political commissar of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the political commissar of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the deputy political commissar of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the deputy political commissar of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任中国人民解放军中部战区陆军参谋长。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the chief of staff of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任中国人民解放军中部战区陆军副参谋长。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the deputy chief of staff of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任中国人民解放军中部战区陆军副参谋长。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the deputy chief of staff of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the deputy chief of staff of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, served as the director of the Political Work Department of the PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任中国人民解放军中部战区陆军后勤部部长。

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军是中国人民解放军陆军的组成部分。
description.en: The PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force is a component of the PLA Ground Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军中部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军隶属于中国人民解放军中部战区。
description.en: The PLA Central Theater Command Ground Force is subordinate to the PLA Central Theater Command.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 作为中央军委主席，习近平在2016年2月1日向包括中部战区在内的五大战区授予军旗并发布训令，正式成立了战区及战区陆军。
description.en: As Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Xi Jinping presented flags and issued orders to the five major theater commands, including the Central Theater Command, on February 1, 2016, officially establishing the theater commands and their ground forces.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军北京军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 在中国人民解放军2016年的改革中，原北京军区被撤销，其下属部分部队被划归新成立的中部战区陆军。
description.en: During the 2016 PLA reforms, the former Beijing Military Region was disbanded, and some of its subordinate units were reassigned to the newly formed Central Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军济南军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 在中国人民解放军2016年的改革中，原济南军区被撤销，其下属部分部队被划归新成立的中部战区陆军。
description.en: During the 2016 PLA reforms, the former Jinan Military Region was disbanded, and some of its subordinate units were reassigned to the newly formed Central Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十一集团军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 陆军第八十一集团军隶属于中部战区陆军。
description.en: The 81st Group Army is subordinate to the Central Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十二集团军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 陆军第八十二集团军隶属于中部战区陆军。
description.en: The 82nd Group Army is subordinate to the Central Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十三集团军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军中部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 陆军第八十三集团军隶属于中部战区陆军。
description.en: The 83rd Group Army is subordinate to the Central Theater Command Ground Force.
